full_summary:
### Tender Notice
#### K8D10-240648: Nutrient Autoanalyzer System

**Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice

**Request for Proposal:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified bidders to submit a proposal for the supply of laboratory equipment, specifically a Nutrient Autoanalyzer System, as part of the Department of the Environment (ECCC) project.

**Bid Submission Deadline:** February 2nd, 2024 at 2:00PM EST. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Contract Details:**

* **Contract Start Date:** February 9th, 2024
* **Contract End Date:** June 30th, 2024
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (excluding NCR)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Department of the Environment (ECCC)

**Procurement Method:** Advance Contract Award Notice

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**goods and Services Classification:** Laboratory and Measuring and Observing and Testing Equipment, Measuring and observing and testing instruments, Liquid and solid and elemental analyzers (UNSPC: 41000000, 41110000, 41113300)

**Contact Information:**

* **Mr. Love**, Kimberley, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **kimberley.love@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**
* 

### Links

* [Notice URL (English)](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18555902?extsite=MTg1NTU5MDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* [Notice URL (French)](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18555902?extsite=MTg1NTU5MDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Attachments

 None. 

---

Here's what I was able to change to make this text more professional:
- confines the unnecessary information to better present essential contract details.
- clarifies the nature of the Notice Type and avoids the use of contractions.
- uses bullet points to reduce the amount of listed data while retaining important details.
- Corrects the Mercy letter from extending off its references.
- Corrected eng Gerald typnouclise appropriate make likelihood
